item.title: How to Remove URLs from Zotero Bibtex
item.description: I'm currently in the process of transitioning my dissertation from LibreOffice into LaTeX because I like pain it's a lot easier to fenagle all of the images and tables while making sure that I'm keeping in-line with the grad school's style formatting requirements.
